feed.title: MeshCentral Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.19
entry.content:
• f93bb3a8 Version 1.1.19
  • 0d7564d8 fix relaying with subdomain #5394
  • 6e2321b5 add multiple file download by check boxes (#5699)
  • 757cef3f missed 1 onmouseup #5700
  • d02b63a4 remove additionalProperties: false in schema to allow comments #5697
  • 1295af46 fix config schema 2024
  • 329ba43e add loginTokenKey to docs #4153
  • 6cacec01 add subfolder to 2fa domain name #5238
  • 9986567c add set remote clipboard to web-rdp #4133
  • b01078bf add get remote clipboard to web-rdp #4133
  • 0b0f2999 fix meshcentral assistant downloads

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.20
entry.content:
• 9f57c27d Version 1.1.20
  • 8547de34 fix drive status undefined
  • cd48909d add application location to info (#5740)
  • ceba76cf fix numlock sending extended keys incorrectly (#5735)
  • c331eca6 add android apk to mobile ui
  • 03cab630 try lscpu if blank cpu_name
  • aaff3abc add cloudflare issue to faq docs
  • b02541cd tweaking docs loginTokeKey (#5733)
  • 18af676c add groupmessage/grouptoast to meshctrl (#5731)
  • 57f77057 fix files connect button order
  • b9c706ce fix amt powerstate again #5722
  • b1451a1c add extra services information
  • b8609819 add linux binary to agentinvite (#5717)
  • 327f2915 Fixed 'deprecated' warnings in gh-workflows (#5720)
  • a2aed9e7 show rdp port on button and set rdpport in console (#5708)
  • aaff8232 fix notes in docs
  • ab835591 add nginx selinux to docs (#5710)
  • 6cb05ce0 add dns servers to details tab (#5709)
  • 21bd1711 make add users to device group box expandable #1718
  • c546333c fix MyFiles cut/copy command #5704
  • 1e9607ba Changed publicpushnotifications setting to use alt.meshcentral.com.

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.21
entry.content:
• 3e04e4d8 Version 1.1.21
  • f2bc7d53 More BitLocker improvements.
  • e5e86fee BitLocker fixes, added drive volumes to details tab.
  • 4637e6b3 Intel AMT fixes.
  • fb15d949 update full version, and marking of the amt to check if activated (#5803)
  • a7018e74 split ips correctly with spaces for domains #5809
  • a3b3ecd8 Dutch language update 1.1.2 (#5804)
  • f2e43cc6 Added option to check HTTP origin.
  • 5c1249cc split ips correctly with spaces #5809
  • 02320562 add extra defaults and descriptions to schema
  • 6f78f9e2 fix one ping/pong function
  • 40988057 update meshcentralrouter with 2fa fix
  • 980eca37 update package lock
  • 512695df Docs update for docker and meshagent msh file (#5791)
  • 15ff7d12 fix agentping (#5786)
  • 6637f08f Docs - Reference docker official (#5788)
  • 990da39f add installdate to installedapps
  • ddcff9f0 use accelerator regardless of cpu core count (#5759)
  • bfec20ac fix account pic transparency (#5761)
  • 550ee34f fix latency bouncing monitors (#5756)
  • e6f27fca fix 2nd line also showing drive name #1892
  • b887457e add bitlocker key to gui for admins (#5747)
  • 4648dbeb create folder first before copy/move #5704
  • cdab5538 show latency in remote/terminal every 10 secs (#5750)
  • cd2ede83 add drive names and icons to files (#5749)
  • 97ed6c82 fix coreinfo and sendPeriodicServerUpdate
  • df94b50d dont sendconsoletext muppet!
  • 9542e77e update volumes and bitlocker periodically
  • 3f8bbe68 fix blank Windows Defender
  • 37911d09 fix bitlocker with multiple drives and german phrase checker
  • 1855dd1d Fixes authenticode signing if a section name starts with an underscore.

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.22
entry.content:
YOU MUST USE NODE 16 OR ABOVE GOING FORWARD

  • fbae83dd Version 1.1.22
  • 8498414a Doc update - Agent Invitation Customization (#5937)
  • d33aa25e Updated Spanish translation.
  • 8775b7dc Set login autocomplete to off when set to false in config.json.
  • e6ee2034 add biosSerial/biosMode to csv (#5949)
  • f874e76f wake mac screen with caffeinate (#5935)
  • 105612c1 Doc update - Custom Web Icons (#5931)
  • 4027ee1b Fixing realname in notification for terminal sessions (#5928)
  • 4f11d7fd allow meshctrl.js to reply with output from runcommands (#5932)
  • b8238ef3 add selfupdate version to schema
  • 4b6da03d fix crash caused my oidc merge
  • 05fca6cb Fix formatting issues from merging (#5909)
  • 150e2337 Add options for overriding TLS ciphers used (#5915)
  • dfc08b05 Login/logout bugfix for OIDC strategy. (#5920)
  • fbe14456 fix windows arm terminal
  • 05ee40c5 add 'EFI Development Kit II / OVMF' as VM
  • 872794e1 update showpaths with domain custom folders #5496
  • 334fee70 Changed insure to ensure (#5913)
  • e9c28d03 add windows arm 64bit to agentinvite page
  • 2d75bbde add osx mpkg customized filename
  • ab0d9c18 Update Passport version in meshcentral.js - Fix bad merge (#5908)
  • d71ca89b Dutch language update 1.1.21 (#5903)
  • 0e896fe9 Bugfix for plugin filemode #5865 (#5897)
  • 0a59f9db update agentinvite with osx universal mpkg
  • c1bec678 allow multiple osx mpkg installs now and update uninstall.command
  • 234acd33 add displayname to macos pkg
  • 473b9d02 add osx custom filename to zip
  • 6f47f2bc add note about apple quarantine for binarys
  • 548c1b9b fix mac memory and invalid smc values
  • 3ffc92e9 Update common.js (#5895)
  • bab35e7b Removed Reddit auth strategy since it never worked well.
  • 4be5b727 Migrate to openid client (#5856)
  • 436a3cb9 Only set fileMode if not win32, #5865
  • e6a71d77 Preservation of the executable rights of the files contained in a plugin (#5865)
  • 9e9cd821 Use userid instead of username when username is null in authlog, #5870
  • 27f76489 Updated archiver to 7.0.0
  • c9377649 Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/Ylianst/MeshCentral
  • e8c4f322 Fix for saving SSH/RDP credentials when a dot is in the username, #5833
  • fb62df32 pad interfaces panel for firefox scrolling #4275
  • 2318a0bb add relay and port to devicesharing in meshctrl.js
  • 636255c8 fix Unzip translations
  • 9241c434 add unzip to files
  • 0e055ef7 remove memory Manufacturer console.log
  • ee59e582 add no consent to guest sharing
  • aa87fd61 maybe fix weird undefined user login accepted #5870
  • b4361d1c fix view only setting incorrect protocol when sharing (#5879)
  • 3e23741c fix Chat & Notify buttons always being shown #5858
  • 016e43c1 Dutch language update 1.1.21 V2 (#5871)
  • 5ed0e4f5 fix mac translate locations
  • 1b60e4db add mac memory/storage (#5869)
  • 269ec02d Dutch language update 1.1.21 (#5862)
  • fce123e9 fix few more translations
  • bca1d277 add osx single binarys and rename tabs
  • 017f777d update android apk to 1.0.21
  • 4cbb95a8 update package.lock
  • 7912df30 update db sysinfo when sysinfo from console
  • 82c70659 show cd-rom as volume
  • 0b2368df add Capacity Remaining
  • 26bb3501 fix translations and add bitlocker in mobile ui
  • 44926e16 update translations
  • 0f23fa0a fix linux txt translating
  • a80c0ef4 fix translation values in details tab (#5841)
  • 79e137db Polish translation - Fix typo (#5840)
  • af3e7f61 fix rdp port translation
  • 936aaa0b disconnect sessions first before logout on idletimeout (#5838)
  • 27201548 fix formatting oops #bb93c11
  • bb93c113 move rdpport to right side to fix translations #5834
  • 9ef1cc64 fix translate.json
  • a14390e0 update Android apk to 1.0.20
  • a77d4050 French bitlocker fix (#5832)
  • 76485713 Update SECURITY.md
  • 9ef48eac Create SECURITY.md
  • 7bc28b5d Update Polish translation for Meshcentral v 1..1.21 (#5822)
